Today, the South coast is seeing some action with Porthcurno and Praa Sands offering 3ft @10s WSW. Winds are moderate at 16 mph NNW, making for a workable session. Tomorrow, conditions drop slightly with 3ft @8s WSW and fresh onshore winds, leading to a less favorable surf day. By the day after, expect a solid 8ft @16s W swell, but watch for stronger winds. Best: today.
